definition: to shrink (in the wash)/fig. to shrink (of profits etc)
to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Woollen fabrics shrink in the wash.
Largely because of the jewelry bear market, De Beers’s fortunes have sunk.
sentences.chinese: 主要因爲珠寶市場熊市，德比爾斯公司資產縮水。

sentences.english: Employment in industry has shrunk by 90% in the past decade, “almost as if by witchcraft”, says one sheepish boss.
sentences.chinese: 工業生產工作崗位在過去十年裏縮水了90%。

sentences.english: This dress material shrinks in the wash.
It is better to allow for shrinkage when buying cotton clothes .
sentences.chinese: 買棉衣時最好要考慮到它們的縮水率。

sentences.english: Astringents are meant to dry up oil and tone the skin.
sentences.chinese: 收縮水就是平衡油脂和調節肌膚的。

sentences.english: They promise that the material won't shrink in the wash. ( v. become smaller because of moisture or heat or cold)
sentences.chinese: 他們承諾這種布料洗後不縮水。

sentences.english: They raised reserve requirements so banks wouldhave less capital to lend.
sentences.chinese: 他們提高了銀行準備金率以令其用於貸款的資產縮水。

sentences.english: This is necessary so that the walls of a building will notshrink or break.
sentences.chinese: 這很重要，這樣造出的牆纔不會縮水和破裂。

sentences.english: As a result, China’s trade surplus will shrink along with its saving rate.
sentences.chinese: 做爲加國，中國的外貿盈餘將會同儲蓄率一起縮水。

sentences.english: Wash with cold water. This will prevent shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 用涼水清洗，以免羽絨服縮水。

sentences.english: It's best to allow for shrinkage when buying cotton clothes.
sentences.chinese: 衣服時最好考慮到它們的縮水率。

sentences.english: A shrinking of U.S. demand would certainly have an impact on China's exports.
sentences.chinese: 美國消費需求的縮水肯定會使中國的出口受到衝擊。

sentences.english: Selling according to the set can't avoid the problem of shrinkage in area.
sentences.chinese: 期房按套銷售並不能迴避面積縮水問題。

sentences.english: Will this woolen sweater shrink when washed?
sentences.chinese: 這件羊毛衫洗後會縮水嗎？

sentences.english: In working with this cloth, be sure to allow for shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 用這種布縫衣，務必考慮到洗後會縮水。

definition: to reverse/to turn around (an undesirable situation)/(mechanics) torsion
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
to undulate/to fluctuate/wave motion/rise and fall
to wither/to dry up (of a plant)/to atrophy (of muscle, social custom etc)
to stock up/to lay in supplies/to hoard (for speculation)/to corner the market in sth
